dimen.name: bouncerViewFinderMargin
dimen.description: The minimum distance between the edge of the screen and the view finder window

dimen.name: bouncerViewFinderVerticalBias
dimen.description: The vertical position of the view finder. Lower numbers shift the view finder towards the top of the screen

dimen.name: bouncerViewFinderHorizontalBias
dimen.description: The horizontal position of the view finder. Lower numbers shift the view finder towards the left of the screen

dimen.name: bouncerCardDetailsMargin
dimen.description: The minimum vertical and horizontal distance between the card details (number, expiry, name) and the border of the view finder window

dimen.name: bouncerInstructionsMargin
dimen.description: The minimum amount of space surrounding the instructions text above the view finder window

dimen.name: bouncerSecurityMargin
dimen.description: The minimum amount of space surrounding the security notification text below the view finder window

dimen.name: bouncerSecurityIconMargin
dimen.description: The distance between the security notification lock icon and the security notification text

dimen.name: bouncerEnterCardManuallyMargin
dimen.description: The minimum amount of space surrounding the Enter Card Mandually text at the bottom of the screen

dimen.name: bouncerNotFoundOutlineWidth
dimen.description: The width of the border around the view finder window when no card is present

dimen.name: bouncerFoundOutlineWidth
dimen.description: The width of the border around the view finder window when a card has been found and the scan has started

dimen.name: bouncerCorrectOutlineWidth
dimen.description: The width of the border around the view finder window when the scan completes

dimen.name: bouncerWrongOutlineWidth
dimen.description: The width of the border around the view finder window when a card has been found but does not match the required card

dimen.name: bouncerPanTextSize
dimen.description: The size of the card number text displayed in the middle of the view finder window

dimen.name: bouncerPanStrokeSize
dimen.description: The size of the outline of the card number text displayed in the middle of the view finder window

dimen.name: bouncerExpiryTextSize
dimen.description: The size of the expiry text displayed in the middle of the view finder window

dimen.name: bouncerExpiryStrokeSize
dimen.description: The size of the outline of the expiry text displayed in the middle of the view finder window

dimen.name: bouncerInstructionsTextSize
dimen.description: The size of the instructions text above the view finder window

dimen.name: bouncerSecurityTextSize
dimen.description: The size of the security text below the view finder window

dimen.name: bouncerEnterCardManuallyTextSize
dimen.description: The size of the Enter Card Manually text at the bottom of the screen

dimen.name: bouncerButtonMargin
dimen.description: The minimum amount of space surrounding the close and torch buttons

dimen.name: bouncerIconStrokeWidth
dimen.description: The width of the lines of the close and torch buttons
